about_the_game:
Get ready for an exciting adventure in the game Demon’s Soar, a 2D arcade game!
This captivating game immerses you in an atmosphere of excitement where you will control a majestic demonic bird soaring into the skies.

In Demon’s Soar, your skill and agility will be put to the ultimate test! Each level is filled with stunning visual effects and unique locations that will draw you in.
But be careful! On your path, you will encounter all sorts of obstacles—from sharp spikes to malicious creatures ready to stop you.

Game Features:
User-friendly controls
Unique locations and visual effects
Various obstacles
A test of reaction time and patience

In Demon’s Soar, your skill and agility will be put to the ultimate test! Each level is filled with stunning visual effects and unique locations that will draw you in.
But be careful! On your path, you will encounter all sorts of obstacles—from sharp spikes to malicious creatures ready to stop you.

name: Demon’s Soar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650/GTX 1050-ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Demon’s Soar is not just a game; it's a test of your reflexes and perseverance. Develop your skills, overcome every obstacle, and become a master of the heavenly flight!
